abstract: Major companies like General Electric and Bank of America, and smaller ones, too, have begun campaigns proclaiming that America’s future is bright.
snippet: Major companies like General Electric and Bank of America, and smaller ones, too, have begun campaigns proclaiming that America’s future is bright.
lead_paragraph: The American economy is back  or so some of the country’s biggest advertisers are saying in new campaigns.

headline.main: In New Campaigns, Spots Take On a Rosier Hue

abstract: General Electric is one of many advertisers who are trumpeting America's bright future in its new commercials.
snippet: General Electric is one of many advertisers who are trumpeting America's bright future in its new commercials.
lead_paragraph: General Electric is one of many advertisers who are trumpeting America's bright future in its new commercials.

abstract: A proposed deal to acquire media giant NBC Universal would give its current owner, General Electric, the ability to unwind its stake over several years, and could see Comcast commit billions more to the joint venture, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: A proposed deal to acquire media giant NBC Universal would give its current owner, General Electric, the ability to unwind its stake over several years, and could see Comcast commit billions more to the joint venture, The Associated Press reported...
lead_paragraph: A proposed deal to acquire media giant NBC Universal would give its current owner, General Electric, the ability to unwind its stake over several years, and could see Comcast commit billions more to the joint venture, The Associated Press reported, citing a person close to the situation.

headline.main: G.E. May Unwind NBC Stake Slowly, Report Says
